article_title: A Top Topic for Governors: Supreme Court Case on Health Law
article_text:
WASHINGTON—If the Supreme Court overturns the Affordable Care Act’s tax credits in most of the country, governors firmly expect the next move is Washington’s.

The governors, in town for the National Governors Association winter meeting, say the issue is a top focus at their conference and will be high on the list of topics when they meet Monday with President Barack Obama.

The states are divided over whether the high court,...
